# Analysis of contingency tables

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides the calculations of Quetelet coefficients for the analysis of contingency tables based on Mirkin (2001, 2023).
It requires input of a contingency table in .csv format

This work is still in progress.
Zina Taran
